titleStmt.title: The bill of foure subsidies for the reliefe of the Kings army, was disputed on by a grand committee, and upon the debate, made choice of Sir Symon Dewes. Who speake as followeth. March 9th. 1641.
titleStmt.author: D'Ewes, Simonds, Sir, 1602-1650.

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1641[2]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
